text: <@U0UHG4VP1> can you please create a hyperledger/blockchain-explorer gerrit project and git repo? We will also need a jira project. Thanks!
actually, I guess it would be simply blockchain-explorer project

<@U11HH3P7Y>: <@U1AU8DRQR>: WRT JJB sandbox: you will need to be able to follow these instructions: <http://docs.opendaylight.org/en/stable-boron/submodules/releng/builder/docs/jenkins.html#jenkins-sandbox> g/opendaylight/s//hyperledger/g the URL is <http://jenkins.hyperledger.org/sandbox/|jenkins.hyperledger.org/sandbox/> auth with LFID you two are the only approved people in there. Every little bit of auth isn’t set up - I don’t think it will work right now - and I need to add the bits that talk to OpenStack to provision builders, but you can get a head start
